p: Blood was collected postmortem from the caudal vessels of each fish using a 1mL syringe and 23-gauge needle. Blood samples were placed in ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) coated tubes and centrifuged for 15 minutes at 10,000 x g. After centrifugation, plasma samples were collected and stored at –80 °C until analyzed. Total Se concentration and GPX activities were measured in individual plasma samples.
